channel.title: Pickup
channel.description: What is the Code for "pickup items" in hybridscape?

item.title: Pickup
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

[quote=“LeScape Pk, post:8, topic:76453”]Here…

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("(your name)") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No Such Item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use As ::pickup 0995 10"); }[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 01:17:43 AM[/size][hr]mines cooler because non admins w\ certain usernames can do it =][/quote]
Actually I had preset restrictions, so I didn’t have to type out if(playerRights = 3) { sendmessage(“noob”); } everytime I wanted to make a command.

So I have if (playerRights = 2) { commands here }

Read full topic

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("(your name)") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No Such Item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use As ::pickup 0995 10"); }[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 01:17:43 AM[/size][hr]mines cooler because non admins w\ certain usernames can do it =]

item.title: Pickup
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup")) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); } }

Read full topic
